appDescription.message: Gain more knowledge with less pain

unexpected_error_message.message: Unexpected error occurred 😢! Please try again later...

login_failed_message.message: ログインに失敗しました。もう一度お願いします。

popup_introduce_first.message:
We spend so much time on the Internet.
Yes, no excuse. But a day remains 24 hours since we have the clock. From now on, this extension will help you use Internet more efficient. Just try to see! 😊

popup_introduce_choose_lang_codes.message: Nice to meet you, {user_name}! 🎉 I know your first language is {first_language}, do you want to show content in other languages?

popup_introduce_choose_pages.message:
Great! 🤩 One last step...
You can select your most visited websites to start. That's it!

create_set_page_title.message: セットを作成しましょう！

pageCreateSetItemsTitle.message: セットの各アイテム追加

create_set_field_tags_extra.message: 例えば： IELTS, 英語文法, AWS associate mock test

leave_warning_message.message: 入力した情報はまだ保存されていません。大丈夫ですか?
